text: "Good for office use like audit office"This part suggests that the item being described is well-suited for professional or office environments, particularly in settings like an audit office. An audit office typically requires tools or furniture that are functional, reliable, and conducive to tasks such as data analysis, document review, or meetings. Therefore, this implies that the product meets the practical needs of such an environment, such as being efficient, ergonomic (to some extent), or appropriate for work-related tasks."But body is not that great"This part highlights a drawback or limitation of the product. The phrase "body is not that great" could refer to the physical build, design, or material quality of the item Read more
